title: Why I think League of Legends ranked is fucked up.
body:
I've been playing League for like 3 years now and I'm okay at it.

But in so many games I've noticed something.

It only takes just ONE person to do bad for THE OTHER FOUR people to suffer.

I don't see why people can call this a TEAM GAME when the entire outcome of the game can be changed by JUST ONE PERSON.

You can't say "oh but you can get ganked and that's teamwork". What about when there is no gank? And your teammate is 0-10 while you're 8-0?

I've been waiting for something like this to be changed but seriously.

Add a tier called Hell under bronze. What the honest f**k is the point of adding Master when there's so many more people getting undeserved ranks in Bronze-Gold.

It takes one person to f**k up everyone's experience.

Also I do rage a lot. And I get chat banned but why? Because I rage a lot? You do realise if someone holds their rage in something much worse is going to happen other than the bad person actually being called bad?

There's so many factors of this game that piss me off.

I lose ELO because of one person.
My enemies gain ELO because of one person.

What do you mean undeserved ranks? Last i checked Bronze, Silver and Gold isn't an achievement, if a bad player is in Gold then there's a reason they're there and that is because they aren't very good, that is low elo for a reason, you're acting like you're better than these players when really you're no different from them.

You get chat banned because you're an immature person that cant keep your comments to yourself.

Yes you do lose elo because of one person, that is how a team game works.
